Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface Bounded

All Superinterfaces:
DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
AABBCollided, AABBCollider, AABBSideAwareCollided, BufferedMoveable, Moveable, Placeable, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ShapeEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
public interface Bounded
extends DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider
Implementing this interface exposes the getNonTransformedBounds() method, which returns the bounds, aka Bounding Box, of this Entity.
